metadata.title: CVE-2021-4019 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
vim is vulnerable to Heap-based Buffer Overflow

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-4019` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
vim-athena - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
vim-common - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
vim-gtk3 - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
vim-gui-common - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
vim-motif - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
vim-nox - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
vim-runtime - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
vim-tiny - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
xxd - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vim package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1').
